Hi,

I've been looking at tools for integration testing for ejb30
applicati=
ons (container agnostic) and the two tools I bumped into
looked a bit dated=
 Cactus and JunitEE. Neither supports junit 4.3
directly. The container ver=
sion support (start/stop) also looks dated. 

What are tools are people out=
 there using for integration testing?

Martin
